summary: the nasopharynx plays an important role in bovine health. the nasopharynx is also the niche for potentially pathogenic agents. the nasopharynx is also the niche for potentially pathogenic agents. electronic supplementary material available to authorized users. nasopharyngeal microbiota of cattle at days 0, 2, 7 and 14 of study. day 0 samples were taken prior to transport to feedlot. the percent variation explained by the principal coordinates is indicated on the axes.
